    • Method Detail

      • constructInvariantStatements

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> constructInvariantStatements​()
        Transforms the constraints into a set of invariant strings. Also simplifies the constraints to remove redundancies. Since the order of the invariants does not matter, we can use an unordered container (as opposed to using an ordered one).
        Returns:
        set of invariant strings
